analysis.description: AVToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#368-374) is declared view but contains assembly code

AVToken (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#46-384) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#296-310)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#312-317)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#317-324)

AVToken.populateFromItemRegistry has external calls inside a loop:
	- priceOfItem[_itemIds[i]] > 0 || itemRegistry.priceOf(_itemIds[i]) == 0 (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#136-141)

Reentrancy in AVToken.listItemFromRegistry (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#142-151):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(itemRegistry.ownerOf(_itemId) != address(0)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#145-146)
	- require(bool)(itemRegistry.priceOf(_itemId) > 0) (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#146-147)
	- price = itemRegistry.priceOf(_itemId) (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#148-150)
	- itemOwner = itemRegistry.ownerOf(_itemId) (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#150)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- listedItems (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#150-151)
	- ownerOfItem (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#150-151)
	- priceOfItem (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#150-151)
	- startingPriceOfItem (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#150-151)

AVToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#368-374)
	- /unique_chucks/9/0x079a09fda4ecd57f76a739152e88a8267a86c240.sol#371-373
